alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garden and southwestern Sheridan Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 558 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antioch, or 12 miles east of Alliance. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antioch, Snow Lake, Wickson Lake, Krause Lake and Lakeside. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 2 and 3. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
